title: Principal bundle
summary: In mathematics, a principal bundle[1][2][3][4] is a mathematical object that formalizes some of the essential features of the Cartesian product X Ã— G {\displaystyle X\times G} of a space X {\displaystyle X} with a group G {\displaystyle G} .
